content: WASHINGTON  June 9 CSRA LLC  a unit of CSRA Inc   won a $498 million dollar contract for certain commercial infrastructure services related to Defense Department facilities  the Pentagon said on Friday. (Reporting by Timothy Ahmann; Editing by Chris Reese)

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  April 04 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the Issuer Default Rating (IDR) assigned to CSRA Inc. (NYSE: CSRA) at 'BBB-'.  The Rating Outlook has been revised to Negative. Approximately $3.1 billion of debt outstanding as of Dec. 30  2016 (including the company's outstanding accounts receivable facility) is affected by this action. The Negative Outlook reflects that revenue has underperformed management guidance provided prior
name: CSRA Inc
title: Fitch Affirms CSRA's IDR at 'BBB-'; Outlook Revised to Negative
